description: Learn how to make butter chicken in a slow cooker. Set and forget it to achieve a rich flavour just like your favourite takeaway dish.
name: Slow Cooker Butter Chicken Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: coriander leaves and basmati rice (to serve)
0.5 cup light thickened cream for cooking

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Add chicken and cook for 3 minute on each side or until golden. Transfer to the bowl of a 5.5L slow cooker.

Add onion to pan and cook for 5 minutes or until softened. Add garlic, ginger and curry paste and cook for 2 minutes or until fragrant. Add puree, stock, cinnamon and cardamom and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 5 minutes. Carefully pour mixture into slow cooker bowl and cover with lid. Cook on high for 3 hours or until chicken is tender.

Remove lid and cook, uncovered, for 30 minutes or until sauce has slightly thickened. Spoon 1/2 cup sauce mixture into a bowl and add cream, stirring to combine. Return cream mixture to slow cooker bowl, gently stirring to combine. Cook for 2 minutes or until heated through.
Scatter coriander over butter chicken and serve with rice.
